aboard.translation[0].definitions[0].def: on or onto a ship, plane, or train
aboard.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: They finally went aboard the plane.
aboard.translation[1].definitions[0].def: on or onto a ship, plane, or train
aboard.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The plane crashed, killing all 200 people aboard.
The boat swayed as he stepped aboard.
